name: MediaShala
tag_list: design, interaction-design, software, enterprise-software, india, research, uxd, ui, interface-design, new-media
overview:
MediaShala is primarily an ‘Interaction Design’ practice based out of India. Most of the work transpires at the intersection of Design, Technology, Society and Industry. The firm serves clients as well as self initiates systems products and services.

In a span of four years the firm has added valuable experience to it’s showcase, some highlights ~

~ Designing and architecting Fleet tracking solutions for India’s largest Logistics players. ~ Solving the ‘Inventory’ puzzle for offshore oil-rigs. ~ Crafting the control room visualization and dashboard for city bus transport offices. ~ Visualizing social cause’s data and helping Non-profit’s get their due leverage off technology.- featuring in LA times and CNN. ~ Participating in the creation of award winning iphone and Mac applications.’Camera plus pro’ & ‘Boom’- Macworld awards ~ Helping landmark brands like ‘Flipkart’ find the perfect Branding and identity for themselves. ~ Crafting cutting edge tools for ‘Utility tracking & management’ for Industries to tackle the oncoming energy crisis and ever increasing utility cost. ~ Creating tools for truly democratizing equities trading in India.
